meanings.definition: (adjective) causing damage to the myelin sheath of nerve fibers
meanings.sent1: The demyelinating disease affected the nerves' protective covering.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the demyelinating condition in the patient's nervous system.
meanings.sent3: The demyelinating process made the nerves look like they lost their winter coats.
meanings.sent4: The demyelinating impact on the nerves was like peeling off layers of protection.
meanings.sent5: The demyelinating effect on the nerves was like removing the insulation from wires.
